Metadata.title: RavenDB or Elastic: The best database for you?
Metadata.metaDescription: Let's compare RavenDB and Elastic to see who is ACID, scalable, high availability, and has superior performance. Which is the best NoSQL Document Database?

Name: Holding Off Harvey With High Availability

Metadata.title: Holding Off Harvey With High Availability

SeoMetaProperties.description: Hurricane Harvey was the ultimate high availability test for all databases both SQL and NoSQL. In a crisis, can technology’s best fend off nature’s worst?

Name: Why are so Many NoSQL Databases Getting Hacked?

Metadata.title: Why are so Many NoSQL Databases Getting Hacked? | RavenDB

SeoMetaProperties.description: Over 100,000 MongoDB databases have been hijacked. Hackers have also raided servers hosting data on ElasticSearch, Apache CouchDB, and Hadoop. What's going on?
